thread.title: Brit Awards 2017: Full list of the winners
thread.title_full: Brit Awards 2017: Full list of the winners

title: Brit Awards 2017: Full list of the winners
text:
22 February 2017 at 9:52pm Brit Awards 2017: Full list of the winners Little Mix won British Single for 'Shout Out to My Ex'. Credit: PA 
The Brits saw two awards handed to the late David Bowie and tributes to George Michael. 
Here is a full list of the winners: British Female Solo Artist - Emeli Sande British Group - The 1975 British Male Solo Artist - David Bowie British Breakthrough Act - Rag'n'Bone Man Rag'n'Bone Man picks up the British Breakthrough Act award. Credit: PA British Single - Little Mix, "Shout Out to My Ex" Global Success - Adele International Male Solo Artist - Drake International Female Solo Artist - Beyonce Emeli Sande performed and won British Female Solo Artist. Credit: PA International Group - A Tribe Called Quest British Video - One Direction, "History" British Album of the Year - David Bowie, "Black Star" Brits Icon - Robbie Williams The 1975 won British Group. Credit: PA
